Package si.ijs.kt.clus.util.jeans.util

Class FileUtil

java.lang.Object
si.ijs.kt.clus.util.jeans.util.FileUtil
public class FileUtil extends Object
A Helper Class for working with Files on the Persistent Storage.

1.0
Author:
Jeans

    • dirList

      public static String[] dirList(String dirname) throws FileNotFoundException
      Return a list of all the files in a given (by name) Directory.
      Parameters:
      dirname - The name of the Directory.
      Returns:
      The Names of all the Files in that Directory.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the Directory in not found.

    • recursiveFind

      Throws:
      IOException

    • recursiveFindAll

      public static void recursiveFindAll(File dir, String pattern, ArrayList res) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • dirList

      public static String[] dirList(String dirname, String extension) throws FileNotFoundException
      Return a list of all the files in a given (by name) Directory, filtered by Extension.
      Parameters:
      dirname - The name of the Directory.
      extension - The Extension to filter the Files on.
      Returns:
      The Names of all the Files in that Directory with the given Extension.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the Directory in not found.

    • readTextFile

      public static String[] readTextFile(String filename) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Reads a Text File and Returns a list of all the Lines of Text.
      Parameters:
      filename - The Name of the File to read.
      Returns:
      The list of Text Lines.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the File was not found in the File SASystem.
      IOException - if an error occured while reading the File.
